translations.StartMessage: Start Adding Questions to Your Survey

OneToFive.Description: Regular 1-5 question from “1: Strongly disagree” to “5: Strongly agree”.

MultipleChoice.Title: Multiple Choice
MultipleChoice.Description: Multiple choice question with freedom to collect different types of information.

Text.Title: Text
Text.Description: Collect free text answers with open ended questions with this question type.

NPS.Title: NPS
NPS.Description: Questions with Net Promoter Score answer and result
